com.facebook.litho

Class DrawableMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • Matrix
      • com.facebook.litho.DrawableMatrix

  • public final class DrawableMatrix
extends Matrix
    Static class containing a factory method for creating a matrix to apply to a drawable.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static DrawableMatrix create(Drawable d, ScaleType scaleType, int width, int height)
      Create a matrix to be applied to a drawable which scales the drawable according to its scale type.
      boolean shouldClipRect() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • shouldClipRect

        public boolean shouldClipRect()
        Returns:
        True if this Matrix requires a clipRect() on the bounds of the drawable.

      • create

        public static DrawableMatrix create(Drawable d,
                                    ScaleType scaleType,
                                    int width,
                                    int height)
        Create a matrix to be applied to a drawable which scales the drawable according to its scale type.
        Parameters:
        d - The drawable to create a matrix for
        scaleType - A scale type describing how to scale the drawable.
        width - The width of the drawable's container.
        height - The height of the drawable's container.
        Returns:
        The scale matrix or null if the drawable does not need to be scaled.
